classifications.description_long: A session that is pending classification.
A session where a Feeder instance successfully transmitted information to a Hive with no indication of malicious activity.
A feeder instance successfully communicated with an attacker impersonating a Hive instance.
An attacker tried authenticating using credentials previously transmitted in a honeybee.
An attacker connected to a Hive instance and tried to authenticate using credentials not transmitted in any recorded honeybee.
